comments.body: Probably good to state above "A {@code CallbackHandler} that recognizes {@link OAuthBearerTokenCallback} to return an unsecured OAuth 2 bearer token and {@link SaslExtensionsCallback} to return  SASL extensions."

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +59,63 @@ * calculated automatically. *

*

* You can also add custom unsecured SASL extensions using * {@code unsecuredLoginExtension_}. Extension keys and values are subject to regex validation.
